title: WPL 2024: Asha Sobhana's Heroics Steal the Show as RCB Edges Out UP Warriorz in Thrilling Encounter
content:
The Women's Premier League (WPL) 2024 served up another nail-biting encounter as the Royal Challengers Bangalore (RCB) secured a dramatic two-run victory over the UP Warriorz at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru.

Asha Sobhana emerged as the star of the show for RCB, claiming a stunning five-wicket haul (5/22) to turn the tide in a match that went down to the wire.  Sobhana's crucial three-wicket over in the 17th over, including the dismissals of Grace Harris and Shweta Sehrawat, proved to be the turning point.

Earlier, RCB posted a respectable 157/6 thanks to half-centuries from S Meghana and Richa Ghosh.  The UP Warriorz, despite a strong start, were unable to chase down the target, finishing with 155/7.  Sophie Molineux defended 11 runs in the final over to secure a thrilling victory for RCB.
author: Scroll Staff
